snippet: ETRA--Blanche. It is with deep sorrow that the Officers, Board of Governors, members and staff of Fresh Meadow Country Club mourn the loss of our esteemed member, Mrs. Blanche Etra. The Etra's have been members of Fresh Meadow for 37 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her husband Bernard, sister Doris, children Ricky (Susan), Kenny (Karen) and Elyse (Len), seven grandchildren and twelve great-grandchildren. Lee D. Charles, President Howard Hershenhorn, Secretary 1/3
lead_paragraph: ETRA--Blanche. It is with deep sorrow that the Officers, Board of Governors, members and staff of Fresh Meadow Country Club mourn the loss of our esteemed member, Mrs. Blanche Etra. The Etra's have been members of Fresh Meadow for 37 years. We extend our heartfelt sympathy to her husband Bernard, sister Doris, children Ricky (Susan), Kenny (Karen) and Elyse (Len), seven grandchildren and twelve great-grandchildren. Lee D. Charles, President Howard Hershenhorn, Secretary 1/3
